posts.post_content: I would like to purchase an SGC graded example of a T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp. Any player (except on the Cubs). Send scan and price to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]

posts.post_title: Re: WTB: T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp
posts.post_content: Wouldn't you know it-my only graded one is a Cub...[url]http://t206.monkberry.com/tobacco.html[/url]
